span.p: The April 15, 2020 School Board Meeting has been postponed. The meeting has been rescheduled for Wednesday, April 29, 2020 at 6:30 p.m.

a.title: Go to comments for April 2020 School Board Meeting

span.p: Dear families, please note that April 9th, 13th, 14th, and 15th will be considered in-session as make-up days during this period of online instruction.

a.title: Go to comments for School Make-Up Days

div.p: California Area School District is proud to offer SchoolCafé, a safe and secure way for parents to make online payments to their children’s cafeteria accounts.

img.alt: California Area School District Safety Committee Mission Statement

a.span: California Area School District Safety Committee Mission Statement

div.p: Our job is to provide a safe and healthful environment for all employees. It is our job to make sure that our facility is free of hazards and unsafe conditions. We will do our best to uphold the highest safety standards to minimize the risk of illness or injury for our employees.

a.title: Go to comments for California Area School District Safety Committee Mission Statement
